name: Amiga Demo Compiler Example
description:
This is an Amiga demo compiler i have developed in AMOS Professional, you can add your .iff images inside the floppy removing the one that are inside from Workbench after loading the floppy image, and renameing it imm1,iff till imm8.iff. You can use ADTPRO to convert the images from BMP to IFF in your amiga in 320x256 resolution. To load the image insert when loaded the demo compiler the timing between images loading. It can be something like 10000 or 100000 or everyting you want the more, the more time to wait between scrolling images.To load the image write all the 8 (16 in the second version) images name like imm1.iff imm2.iff ... till imm8.iff, you can choose also another order to load the images, for example imm4.iff imm8.iff and so on, than press return and enjoy your demo.

I have also attached a .adf floppy image with 16 images and music.
